actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to include in the President's budget of the United States Government a statement of the interest which accrues for each fiscal year on outstanding zero-coupon bonds.

summary.text: Directs the President to include in the budget a separate statement estimating the interest on outstanding zero-coupon bonds.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to include in the President's budget of the United States Government a statement of the interest which accrues for each fiscal year on outstanding zero-coupon bonds.
